fulltext:
DO DINH BIEN 
Senior Mobile Developer 
SUMMARY 
I have over 7 years of experience working in mobile application. Mobile developer is my favorite and 
advantage. I was also the technical lead in some projects that I worked on. 
Experience: 
- 
IOS : 7year 
- 
Android: 1 year 
- 
Xamarin: 5 year 
- 
Cordovar 1 year. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
▪ 
Operating system: MAC, Window 
▪ 
Mobile Platforms: iOS, Xamarin Form, Xamarin, Android,Cordova-Ionic 
▪ 
Application framework: 
• 
IOS: Core-Data, Core animation,AFNetworking, Map kit, Core-Location, SQLite, Realm, 
Mantle, Magical Record, GCD, Block … 
• 
Xamarin: Mono touch, Rest Sharp, Rest Client, core Xamarin, Mvvmcross, MVVM, Map kit 
▪ 
Programming Languages: Object-c, Swift, C# 
▪ 
Foreign Languages: English 
▪ 
Bug Tracking System: JIRA, Bugzilla, etc. 
▪ 
Document Collaboration Tools: Confluence, XWiki 
EDUCATION & PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATION 
▪ 
University Information Technology (2006 – 2011) 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
